verses.verse: There was a <S%G444>man<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G3530>Nicodemus,<s%> a <S%G758>ruler<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews:<s%>

The <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> by <S%G3571>night,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G4461>Rabbi,<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> that you are a <S%G1320>teacher<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> from <S%G2316>God:<s%> for <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G4592>miracles<s%> that you <S%G4160>do,<s%> <S%G3362>except<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> be with him.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G281>Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3362>Except<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> be <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G509>again,<s%> he cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3530>Nicodemus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> be <S%G1080>born<s%> when he is <S%G1088>old?<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> he <S%G1525>enter<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G1208>time<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> his <S%G3384>mother's<s%> <S%G2836>womb,<s%> and be <S%G1080>born?<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G281>Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3362>Except<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> be born <S%G1080><s%> of <S%G5204>water<s%> and of the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> he cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
That which is <S%G1080>born<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> is <S%G4561>flesh;<s%> and that which is <S%G1080>born<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> is spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
<S%G2296>Marvel<s%> not that I <S%G2036>said<s%> to you, You <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G1080>born<s%> again. <S%G509><s%>

The <S%G4151>wind<s%> <S%G4154>blows<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> it <S%G2309>wants,<s%> and you <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G5456>sound<s%> <S%G846>thereof,<s%> but <S%G1492>can<s%> not <S%G1492>tell<s%> from <S%G4159>where<s%> it <S%G2064>comes,<s%> and <S%G4226>where<s%> it <S%G5217>goes:<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> is <S%G3956>every<s%> one that is <S%G1080>born<s%> of the Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
<S%G3530>Nicodemus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things be?
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G1488>Are<s%> you a <S%G1320>master<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> and <S%G1097>know<s%> not <S%G5023>these<s%> things?

<S%G281>Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, We <S%G2980>speak<s%> that we do <S%G1492>know,<s%> and <S%G3140>testify<s%> that we have <S%G3708>seen;<s%> and you <S%G2983>receive<s%> not our witness. <S%G3141><s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> I have <S%G2036>told<s%> you <S%G1919>earthly<s%> things, and you <S%G4100>believe<s%> not, <S%G4459>how<s%> shall you <S%G4100>believe,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G2036>tell<s%> you of <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> things?

And <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> has <S%G305>ascended<s%> up to <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> but he that <S%G2597>came<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> even the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And as <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G5312>lifted<s%> up the <S%G3789>serpent<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> even <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> be <S%G5312>lifted<s%> up:
That whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4100>believes<s%> in him should not <S%G622>perish,<s%> but <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>

For <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> that he <S%G1325>gave<s%> his <S%G3439>only<s%> <S%G3439>begotten<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%> that whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4100>believes<s%> in him should not <S%G622>perish,<s%> but <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G166>everlasting<s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>

For <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> not his <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> to <S%G2919>condemn<s%> the <S%G2889>world;<s%> but that the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> him might be saved. <S%G4982><s%>

He that <S%G4100>believes<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> him is not <S%G2919>condemned:<s%> but he that <S%G4100>believes<s%> not is <S%G2919>condemned<s%> <S%G2235>already,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he has not <S%G4100>believed<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G3439>only<s%> <S%G3439>begotten<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G2920>condemnation,<s%> that <S%G5457>light<s%> is <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> and <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G5457>light,<s%> <S%G1063>because<s%> their <S%G2041>deeds<s%> were evil. <S%G4190><s%>

For <S%G3956>every<s%> one that <S%G4160>does<s%> <S%G5337>evil<s%> <S%G3404>hates<s%> the <S%G5457>light,<s%> neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> to the <S%G5457>light,<s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> his <S%G2041>deeds<s%> should be reproved. <S%G1651><s%>

But he that <S%G4160>does<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> to the <S%G5457>light,<s%> that his <S%G2041>deeds<s%> may be <S%G5319>made<s%> <S%G5319>manifest,<s%> that they are <S%G2038>worked<s%> in God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> and his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G2449>Judaea;<s%> and <S%G1563>there<s%> he <S%G1304>tarried<s%> with them, and <S%G907>baptized.<s%>

And <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> was <S%G907>baptizing<s%> in <S%G137>Aenon<s%> <S%G1451>near<s%> to <S%G4530>Salim,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> there was <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G1563>there:<s%> and they <S%G3854>came,<s%> and were <S%G907>baptized.<s%>
For <S%G2491>John<s%> was not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5438>prison.<s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G2214>question<s%> <S%G1537>between<s%> <S%G3326><s%> some of <S%G2491>John's<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> and the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G2512>purifying.<s%>

And they <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G2491>John,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G4461>Rabbi,<s%> he that was with you <S%G4008>beyond<s%> <S%G2446>Jordan,<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G3140>bore<s%> <S%G3140>witness,<s%> <S%G2396>behold,<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G907>baptizes,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> men <S%G2064>come<s%> to him.

<S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> A <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G3762>nothing,<s%> <S%G3362>except<s%> it be <S%G1325>given<s%> him from <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

You <S%G5210>yourselves<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G3140>bear<s%> me <S%G3140>witness,<s%> that I <S%G2036>said,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> not the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> but that I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> him.

He that <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G3565>bride<s%> is the <S%G3566>bridegroom:<s%> but the <S%G5384>friend<s%> of the <S%G3566>bridegroom,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2476>stands<s%> and <S%G191>hears<s%> him, <S%G5463>rejoices<s%> <S%G5479>greatly<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3566>bridegroom's<s%> <S%G5456>voice:<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> my <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> is <S%G4137>fulfilled.<s%>
He <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G837>increase,<s%> but I must <S%G1642>decrease.<s%>

He that <S%G2064>comes<s%> from <S%G509>above<s%> is <S%G1883>above<s%> <S%G3956>all:<s%> he that is of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> is <S%G1537>earthly,<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2980>speaks<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth:<s%> he that <S%G2064>comes<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is <S%G1883>above<s%> <S%G3956>all.<s%>
And <S%G3739>what<s%> he has <S%G3708>seen<s%> and <S%G191>heard,<s%> that he <S%G3140>testifies;<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G2983>receives<s%> his <S%G3141>testimony.<s%>
He that has <S%G2983>received<s%> his <S%G3141>testimony<s%> has <S%G4972>set<s%> to his <S%G4972>seal<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G227>true.<s%>

For he <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G2980>speaks<s%> the <S%G4487>words<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> for <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>gives<s%> not the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> by <S%G3358>measure<s%> to him.
The <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G25>loves<s%> the <S%G5207>Son,<s%> and has <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G1722>into<s%> his <S%G5495>hand.<s%>

He that <S%G4100>believes<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G166>everlasting<s%> <S%G2222>life:<s%> and he that <S%G544>believes<s%> not the <S%G5207>Son<s%> shall not <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G2222>life;<s%> but the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3306>stays<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> him.
